Our Friends at BMCNO

The British Motoring Club New Orleans has been the heart of British car enthusiasm in the Gulf South since 1977. Their annual British Motoring Festival in Covington is the premier event in the region â€” and their monthly drives and socials are not to be missed.

Regional British Car Clubs

Your neighbours in the British car community

British Motoring Club New Orleans (BMCNO)

New Orleans, LA

Founded 1977. Social club dedicated to appreciating, preserving and driving British motor vehicles. Hosts the annual British Motoring Festival in Covington, LA. Members span from Dallas to Pensacola.

Visit website â†’

English Motoring Club of Mississippi (EMC)

Jackson, MS area

Over 40 years of enjoying and preserving fine British vehicles. Hosts Brits on the Bluff in Natchez and numerous drives, tech sessions, and social events throughout the year.

Visit website â†’

South Alabama British Car Club (SABCC)

Fairhope / Mobile Bay, AL

Hosts the annual British Car Festival in charming Fairhope, Alabama â€” 35 years strong. Located on the beautiful Eastern Shore of Mobile Bay.

Visit website â†’

Panhandle British Car Association (PBCA)

Pensacola, FL

Home of the beloved Brits on the Bay show in Seville Square, Pensacola. An active club with regular drives and events along the Gulf Coast.

Visit website â†’

Hill Country Triumph Club

Austin / Hill Country, TX

Hosts Texas All British Car Days in Marble Falls â€” the largest all-British car show in Texas. Open to all marques despite the Triumph name.

Visit website â†’

North Alabama British Motoring Society (NABMS)

Huntsville, AL

Founded 1985. Hosts the annual EuroBrit car show in Huntsville, now in its 30th year. Enthusiasts of British and European cars and motorcycles.

Visit website â†’

Know of an Event?

This calendar focuses on British car events within roughly 500 miles of New Orleans. Dates and details may change â€” always check with the organiser before making travel plans.

Got an event we should list? Let us know in the forum or drop us a line on the about page.
